title: Log Rotation Helper Library
description:
Create a Log Rotation Helper library in C# targeting .NET Framework 4.6.2.

Requirements:
- A LogRotator class that manages log file rotation
- Method to check if current log file exceeds size limit
- Method to rotate log files (rename current, create new)
- Support for maximum number of backup files
- Support for optional compression of rotated files using GZip
- Thread-safe operations
- Configuration through constructor parameters

Usage Example:
var rotator = new LogRotator(logPath, maxSizeBytes: 10_000_000, maxBackupCount: 5, compressBackups: true);
rotator.RotateIfNeeded();
